item.title: SQL 2005 Browser add-in for .NET Reflector
item.description: Denis Bauer created a SQL 2005 Browser add-in which is available here.

item.title: CodeMetrics add-in for .NET Reflector
item.description: Jonathan de Halleux released and add-in to compute design code metrics.

item.title: Diff add-in for .NET Reflector
item.description: Sean Hederman has written a diff add-in which is available here.

item.title: 64-bit support for .NET Reflector
item.description: Reflector.exe now runs on the 64-bit version of the .NET Framework.

item.title: Chrome support for .NET Reflector
item.description: Marc Hoffman has created a Chrome language add-in which is available here.

item.title: C++ support for .NET Reflector
item.description: Jamie Cansdale has created a C++ language add-in which is available here.

item.title: Reflector Tips
item.description:
1. To search for members press F3 and click the icon in the top right corner.
2. IL can be selected via the language picker. Ctrl-D is still available.
3. Putting quotes around a word when searching enables word matching.

item.title: .NET Reflector Add-Ins
item.description: A list of Reflector add-ins can be found here.

item.title: .NET Reflector 4.0
item.description: Reflector 4.0 is now available here. The Reflector SDK is now maintained here.

item.title: Demeanor
item.description: Reflector is now obfuscated using Brent Rector's Demeanor.

item.title: Digger for Smartphone
item.description: Mobile version of Digger on 170 x 200 pixels. Download here.

item.title: .NET Resourcer 4.0
item.description: Switched to an SDI interface and added browsing support. Download here.

item.title: Writer for .NET
item.description: Uploaded some WYSIWYG HTML editor code to a GotDotNet workspace.

item.title: Building the Reflector Add-In
item.description: Jamie Cansdale has created an Add-In for hosting .NET Reflector inside Visual Studio. Read the companion article here.

item.title: Delphi support for .NET Reflector
item.description: Peter Sawatzki has created a Delphi add-in which is included in Reflector.

item.title: .NET Reflector 3.0
item.description: Reflector can be found at Programming.NET.
